The name of each of these faculty members below is linked to his or her external or home-department profile page.       adjunct listings    Alonso, Matthew | Visiting Clinical Assistant Professor, Mechanical and Industrial Engineering  Banerjee, Prith | Chief Technology Officer, ANSYS, Inc.
